Text.Page:
Mission Orders

{@LinkCreature:15#14#Blood Fiends} are killing livestock and travelers near the Knoll of Screams. Clear the roads and secure the area.

Report to Moimui at Camp Redemption when mission is complete.
I'll be sure to mention you in my report, <PCNAME>. Perhaps my superiors will see fit to place you on the kingdom guard.
Kill Blood Fiends. Bring me their hearts. Simple, isn't it?
